name: Protect the Bin
description:
Protect a bin is a tower defense game about a racoon who tries to protect his precious trash bin from his enemies.

Controls: WASD to move camera, use mouse to pick towers and click wherever you wish to place them.

Gameplay: Enemies(crabs) will try to reach the racoon and his bin, but this can be prevented by placing towers in their way.

Unfortunately due to different reasons, we weren't able to add nearly as much content as we wanted. In the future, we want to add more towers/enemies, traps, HP's, better visuals, animations, music.
